Title: Prohibits a person convicted of rebellion or insurrection from state or municipal employment
Summary: Prohibits a person convicted of rebellion or insurrection under federal law from state or municipal employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง105, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to prohibiting a person convicted of rebellion or insurrection against the authority of the United States or the laws thereof from state and municipal employment
